summary: Video featuring That Nate Guy visiting Spirit Halloween, showcasing Halloween props, costumes, and animatronics.

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with a view of a store aisle filled with Halloween costumes and accessories, featuring a variety of items such as masks, hats, and costumes displayed on racks and shelves. The store is brightly lit, with a clean and organized appearance. As the camera moves forward, it captures more of the store's interior, including a section with a bright orange shopping basket hanging on a pegboard, labeled "Spirit Halloween Superstore." The aisle is lined with more Halloween-themed merchandise, including costumes and decorations. A person wearing a blue and yellow tie-dye shirt walks past the camera, adding a human element to the scene. The video then transitions to an animated Halloween-themed graphic, featuring a spooky storefront with the text "Spirit Halloween" prominently displayed. The graphic includes various Halloween characters and elements, such as a clown, a skeleton, and a full moon, creating a festive and eerie atmosphere. The video concludes with another animated graphic promoting "That Nate Guy on YouTube," featuring a character holding a pumpkin and a knife, with a background of bats and a haunted house, encouraging viewers to subscribe and engage with the content.
events_list.audio_caption: The clip begins with a male speaker excitedly describing a maze-like environment, joking about "haunted baskets" and Halloween costumes. This is followed by a sudden, jarring crash sound, accompanied by distorted, echoing male speech that warns someone to "stay away". Following the speech is a scream with what sounds like a short sound effect of a sting or synth chord.

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with a man wearing a yellow and blue tie-dye shirt standing in a parking lot, surrounded by cars and people walking around. The scene transitions to a Spirit Halloween store, showcasing its exterior with a large sign and Halloween-themed decorations. Inside the store, the man explores various Halloween costumes and accessories, including a mannequin dressed in a white wedding gown with a veil. He examines a black box labeled 'Elle Hatchet' and a black wig, highlighting the store's diverse offerings. The video captures the bustling atmosphere of the store, with customers browsing and interacting with the products, creating a lively and festive environment.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip begins with a male speaker excitedly announcing he is in Murfreesboro, Tennessee. He speaks enthusiastically about visiting a Spirit Halloween store and possibly finding something special, then the speaker continues describing the scene outside the store. He observes a lady with a scarecrow hat, and a long line to get in. The speaker announces his entrance into the store, speaking in a tone of disbelief upon seeing the contents of the store. Inside, he notes the presence of an "Ellie hatchet," and says that this is the first time he's seen the prop this year. He is then informed that everything on the floor is the last of their stock, including an "Evelyn Leech" display. He notes that "Evelyn Leech" has her hand on the head of another prop, and then describes a piece of velcro attached to the prop, and goes on to activate "Evelyn Leech," leading to sounds of her groaning, followed by a "crying river," ending in wailing and screaming sounds.

events_list.video_caption: In a bustling costume store, a mannequin dressed as a bride with a white veil and gown stands prominently, holding a grotesque mask with glowing yellow eyes and a gaping mouth. The store is filled with various Halloween costumes, including a clown outfit with a green wig and a polka-dotted suit. Shelves stocked with costumes and accessories line the walls, while customers browse and shop. The atmosphere is lively, with people moving around, some in costume, and others in casual attire. The mannequin's eerie mask contrasts with the festive environment, drawing attention amidst the colorful and busy setting.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip features one male speaker who describes seeing a "headless bride" prop online and wondering if it was "based on this", followed by clarifying that "that's the headless groom". The speaker seems to be expressing curiosity or a train of thought. The speech is accompanied by background noises, specifically ambient sounds, which suggest an environmental context that would need more information for further description.

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with a person dressed in a white costume with a ghostly appearance, standing in a store filled with Halloween decorations. The individual is seen adjusting their headpiece, which features glowing yellow eyes and a menacing expression. The scene transitions to a close-up of a pair of green shoes with black and yellow polka-dotted pants, standing on a platform with a warning tape around it. The focus then shifts to a person wearing a clown mask with a sinister grin, green hair, and a colorful outfit, standing in the same store. The camera zooms in on the mask, highlighting its detailed features, including spiral eyes and sharp teeth. The video continues with a close-up of the clown mask, emphasizing its eerie expression. The scene then widens to show the person holding a large, colorful mallet, standing amidst Halloween decorations, including tombstones and other spooky items. The video concludes with the person in the clown costume standing in the store, surrounded by Halloween merchandise, creating a festive yet eerie atmosphere.
events_list.audio_caption: The clip begins with a male speaker suggesting they "come check out the wacky mole," recalling a previous visit where its hand was damaged. The speaker seems to be addressing someone directly, possibly a child, as he coaxes "Mr. Wacky" to come on. He notes the mole isn't moving and that "he tried to trick me." A second male voice with a cartoonish tone delivers a line, including "get swallowed by my hammer." The first male speaker then comments that the mole is talking but not moving, sarcastically addressing him as "Mr. Candy Corn Teeth," before a brief female voice interjects with, "Yeah, what's up."

events_list.video_caption: The video takes place in a Halloween-themed store, showcasing various spooky decorations and costumes. It begins with a display of a '9VOLT OWLIELLA' box, featuring a creepy doll in a purple dress, surrounded by Halloween props like tombstones and a fake sewer grate. The store is bustling with customers, including a person in a clown costume and another in a black hoodie. The camera then focuses on a creepy doll with braided hair, wearing a purple dress, and a person in a black costume with glowing blue eyes, adding to the eerie atmosphere. The store is filled with Halloween merchandise, including tombstones and other spooky items. The scene transitions to a display of a 'PENNYWISE SEWER GRATE' box, featuring a clown emerging from a sewer grate, with a 'Public Works' sign on the grate. The store's environment is lively, with customers browsing and interacting with the Halloween decorations, creating a festive and spooky ambiance.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip opens with a male speaker describing an "Ophelia right here," mentioning that she is working because he can hear a "ghoul" behind her. He then refers to a story where she only had "one eye" and "read the map wrong." The male speaker then mimics Ophelia's whines and suggests she is shocked by the ghoul behind her. The speaker then transitions to describing a "Pennywise sewer grate" and mentions that these have recently started showing up in stores. Throughout the clip, there is a low, consistent buzzing sound in the background.

events_list.video_caption: The video takes place in a well-lit store filled with Halloween decorations and costumes. It begins with a person wearing a tie-dye shirt with the text "BIG PETS" prominently displayed, standing in the store and gesturing towards a display of Halloween items. The camera then shifts to show a variety of costumes and decorations on shelves, including a "Night Stalker" scarecrow figure with a 25% off sticker. The person picks up the box, showing it to the camera, and then places it back on the floor. The scene transitions to a close-up of the person, who appears to be speaking or explaining something, with the store's Halloween-themed merchandise visible in the background. The video captures the lively atmosphere of the store, with other shoppers browsing the items and the person in the tie-dye shirt engaging with the camera, possibly discussing the Halloween products on display.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio begins with a male speaker noting the store is busy, and exclaiming about a "Nightstalker" that is "25% off". He speculates about why it's discounted, saying "I would be willing to bet that there's something about him that doesn't work". Continuing in an excited tone, he mentions that the store is "insanely busy", to the point of having a line outside due to the number of people inside. He then exclaims "Oh my Lord guys", before commenting "I'm not even kidding you". The background sounds throughout the clip indicate a crowded environment, likely a retail store, due to the indistinct chatter of many voices.

events_list.video_caption: The video takes place in a bustling store filled with Halloween decorations and costumes. The camera pans around the store, capturing the lively atmosphere as shoppers browse through the aisles. A person wearing a tie-dye shirt and black pants walks through the store, while another individual in a red shirt and jeans is seen in the background. The store is well-lit, with bright overhead lights illuminating the merchandise. The camera then focuses on a display case containing a boxed item labeled "Johnny Punk," featuring a creepy clown figure. A hand reaches out to touch the box, indicating interest in the product. The camera continues to move, showcasing more Halloween-themed items, including a green and black striped box with a cartoonish design and a doll with an orange hat and red hair. The video concludes with a close-up of a vintage clown doll with an orange shirt and a pumpkin on its head, hanging on a display rack. The overall atmosphere is festive and busy, with customers engaged in shopping for Halloween decorations and costumes.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio begins with a male speaker commenting on how busy the place is, mentioning the location of the payment area and long line, exclaiming, "How crazy is that?"  He then notes finding Evelyn Leeches and something else, expressing excitement and disbelief, exclaiming, "Oh, holy crap!" He also says he just found Johnny Punk in the busiest store. The speaker mentions previously buying Johnny Punk and plans to assemble it soon. He continues describing other items, including the Sandworm Greeter and candy corn.  There's a transition to excitement about finding Uncle Charlie dolls and a vintage clown doll.  The speaker then notes being sweaty and expresses disbelief.  Throughout the speech, there are sounds of a crowd, indicating a busy environment.

events_list.video_caption: The video showcases a person browsing through a store's Halloween costume section, focusing on various costumes and accessories. The individual, identifiable by a tattooed arm, examines a SpongeBob SquarePants costume labeled "Sandy Cheeks," featuring a white outfit with brown spots and a hood with bear ears. The person then moves to a section displaying a Joker mask, characterized by its purple color, green eyebrows, and exaggerated smile, before placing it back on the shelf. The store's environment is well-lit, with a tiled floor and shelves stocked with a variety of costumes, including a Batman costume and other themed outfits. The camera pans across the aisle, revealing an orange shopping basket labeled "Spirit Halloween Superstore," indicating the store's branding. The atmosphere is lively, with other shoppers visible in the background, contributing to the bustling ambiance of the Halloween shopping experience.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip begins with excited male speech about finding a "Sandy Cheeks from Spongebob" costume, and a Barnacle Boy costume. He mentions a "Joker mask with a chin that moves". He finds the layout of the store like "a maze in here". This man continues on in a joking tone, questioning if the hanging baskets are haunted. He then imitates a child saying, "Mom, I want to be a basket for Halloween". Background sounds include general crowd noise, indicating a busy public place.

events_list.video_caption: The video takes place in a store filled with Halloween decorations and costumes. It begins with a display of various Halloween-themed items, including socks, masks, and other accessories. The camera then pans to show a section with devil masks and other spooky decorations. A person wearing a blue and gray shirt is seen interacting with the clown decorations, moving them around and examining them closely. The camera then focuses on a close-up of a hand holding a small card, possibly a product tag, near a green-haired clown mask. The video continues with a close-up of a hand holding a small card near a green-haired clown mask, followed by a shot of a person wearing a gray shirt with a colorful design and blue sleeves, interacting with the clown decorations. The camera then shows a close-up of a green-haired clown mask with a red nose and a black and white polka-dotted outfit. The video concludes with a shot of a Frankenstein mask with glowing yellow eyes, held by a hand holding a small card. Throughout the video, the store's Halloween-themed decorations and costumes create a festive and spooky atmosphere.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip features a single male speaker exploring a Halloween store, his tone enthusiastic and lively. He notes "multicolored spiderwebs all in one pack, orange, green, and purple" and describes various animatronic Halloween decorations. He mentions "vintage hanging devils, hanging kicking clowns," green-headed clowns, and a reaper. He then observes a child who pushed a button on an animatronic and said, "Look, this is me in school," then continues describing other characters. A question is posed about a "spooky character" with one eye, followed by mentions of a reaper with wings and vintage monsters, again emphasizing the recurring theme of characters missing an eye.

events_list.video_caption: The video showcases a Halloween-themed store display featuring various spooky and creepy items. It begins with a close-up of two green Frankenstein masks with glowing yellow eyes, labeled "Spirit Handcrafted Vintage Monster," hanging on a black pegboard wall. The camera then pans to reveal a wider view of the display, including a red balloon with a white spiral base, clown figurines, and other Halloween decorations. A hand reaches out to pick up a clown figurine, examining it closely before placing it back on the shelf. The video concludes with a detailed view of the clown figurine, highlighting its colorful design and eerie expression, set against the backdrop of the Halloween-themed store display.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip begins with a cheerful greeting. A male speaker describes Halloween-themed items, including "pumpkin carving goof scoops" and a "penny wise light up balloon," stating that it is working. He observes "shorties," noting that only a side light activates when pressing the button and dismisses this as "lame". Then, he humorously remarks on one of the "shorties" missing a nose, implying that another character is responsible.

events_list.video_caption:
The video takes place in a bustling store filled with various items, likely a costume or novelty shop. It begins with a view of the store's interior, showcasing shelves stocked with an array of products, including costumes and accessories. People are seen walking around, browsing the items, and interacting with each other. The store has a bright and inviting atmosphere, with well-lit aisles and a clean, organized layout.

The camera then moves through the aisles, focusing on specific products. A close-up shot reveals a hand holding a package labeled "Monster Bolt," which appears to be a novelty item designed to look like a monster's bolt. The packaging features images of people wearing the product, suggesting its use as a costume accessory. The camera continues to pan, showing more products on the shelves, including a "Security Scanner" item, which is likely a humorous or novelty security device.

As the video progresses, the camera captures a hand reaching for a tool, possibly a wrench, from a pegboard display. The pegboard is filled with various tools and accessories, indicating a section of the store dedicated to novelty or costume tools. The camera then shifts to a display of Halloween masks, including a green helmet with a menacing face and a white ghost mask, further emphasizing the store's focus on costumes and themed items.

Throughout the video, the camera captures the dynamic environment of the store, with customers moving around, examining products, and engaging with the merchandise. The overall atmosphere is lively and engaging, with a clear emphasis on the variety and creativity of the items available for purchase.
events_list.audio_caption: The clip begins with a male speaker excitedly exclaiming about a crowd, describing it as "totally illogical." He then suggests escaping down an aisle. The speaker then expresses surprised confusion at finding "monster bolts," which he describes as something to dress up like Frankenstein, followed by him finding missing eyes. He questions if something is a security scanner, suggesting it's something for a security guard costume. The speaker then expresses excitement for "evil pliers," joking about dressing up like an evil dentist. He then comments on a ghost mask reminding him of a specific Scooby Doo movie. He then asks if they have seen a vintage mummy mask in other stores.

events_list.video_caption: The video showcases a variety of Halloween costumes and masks displayed in a store. It begins with a close-up of a yellow and green mummy mask, followed by a display of different masks, including a white ghost mask, a red skeleton mask, and a robot mask. The camera then pans to show a selection of adult costumes, such as 'Hippie Panache' and 'Groovy Girl,' and a child's costume labeled 'Party Pooper.' A person wearing a tie-dye shirt is seen browsing the store, and the camera captures a display of children's costumes, including a blue one resembling a character from a popular animated series and a pink one labeled 'Patrick.' The video concludes with a view of the store's interior, highlighting the variety of costumes available for purchase.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip features one male speaker enthusiastically commenting on items he encounters, saying “I think we have… that is sweet, I love the colors on that," then describing a "vintage jolly ghost mask," and excitedly noting that "this is the perfect music for these costumes." A music track plays in the background, suitable for Halloween, creating a spooky yet playful mood. The speaker then asks, "What kind of hat is this?" and comments on a "giant Russian figurehead," possibly relating to Drago. Next, he politely requests someone to use air freshener, then mentions "plenty of baskets," lamenting that he forgot the stickers. Finally, he exclaims his surprise, "What in the world it is Baby Patrick!" followed by “And it’s a Baby Strongman!”

events_list.video_caption: The video showcases a bustling store filled with various costumes for Halloween. It begins with a close-up of a hand holding a 'Strongman' costume package, featuring a baby in a red and white striped outfit with a black belt, surrounded by playful animal illustrations. The camera then pans to reveal the store's interior, bustling with shoppers browsing through racks of costumes, including a 'Baby Boo Bunting' package with a baby in a white outfit and animal designs. The store is well-lit, with a tiled floor and a variety of costumes displayed on shelves and racks, including a 'Hugz the Clown' costume with a purple wig and a sign reading 'FREE HUGZ!'. The camera continues to move, capturing more costumes such as a 'Scooby-Doo' package with a green shirt and brown hair, and a 'The Flintstones' costume featuring Wilma in a white dress. The video concludes with a wider view of the store, highlighting the diverse selection of costumes available, including a 'Scooby-Doo Union Suit' package, and the lively atmosphere of shoppers exploring the options.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio opens with a man expressing his surprise at the crowd size in a "spirit store" before excitedly pointing out "hugs the clown". He continues, wondering if a "Big Top Terror" costume could be "hugs' little brother". He then exclaims, "Holy crap, I found my costume! It's He-Man!", before considering being Fred Flinstone. Growing uneasy, he says it's "uber creepy in here." He then attempts to greet someone. Simultaneously, there's upbeat music with a happy tone accompanying the man's speech, transitioning to eerie, suspenseful background sounds. In addition, there is indiscernible murmur of voices throughout the clip.

events_list.video_caption: The video showcases a variety of Halloween costumes and accessories in a store setting. It begins with a close-up of a Scooby-Doo costume package, featuring two individuals dressed in brown outfits with blue collars and ears, standing against a green background. The text on the package reads "Scooby-Doo and Shaggy Costume Set" in English. The scene transitions to a display of Halloween-themed items, including a black cat-shaped crossbody bag with a yellow eye and an orange outline, hanging on a pegboard. Next, a "Killer Clown" costume package is shown, featuring a person with red and black hair, white face paint, and a black and red outfit, holding a knife. The text on the package reads "Spirit Killer Clown" in English. Following this, a "Twister Costume Set" package is displayed, featuring a person in a black and white striped outfit with a red wig, holding a red wig in one hand and a black wig in the other. The text on the package reads "Twister Costume Set" in English. The video then shows a "Uncle Charlie" costume package, featuring a person in an orange and yellow checkered outfit with a red wig, holding a black bucket labeled "Free and" and a lollipop. The text on the package reads "Uncle Charlie" in English. The scene shifts to a man wearing a yellow and blue tie-dye shirt, standing in the store, with shelves of Halloween decorations visible in the background. The video concludes with a view of a store aisle filled with Halloween decorations, including a ghost costume, tombstones, and other spooky items, with a person in a white ghost costume walking through the aisle. The overall atmosphere of the video is festive and themed around Halloween, with a focus on costumes and accessories.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip begins with light, playful music in the background. A male speaker expresses excitement over a vintage cat crossbody bag. He then chuckles, describing a "killer clown chick" with a humorous expression. Next, he notices an "Uncle Charlie" item, mentioning a bucket. He notes it doesn't appear to come with the item, suggesting one obtain their own.  He also mentions the possible need to add "free candy" onto said bucket. A pause, then a warning about children with weapons. The speaker continues with a worried tone, and then jokes that he may dress up as a chicken. Finally, he declares that he's seen "just about everything" and suggests a look at some "babies."

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with a display of creepy baby dolls, each with unique features such as painted eyes, fake spiders, and zombie-like appearances, set against a black pegboard wall. A hand with a tattoo touches one of the dolls, emphasizing its unsettling details. The scene transitions to a store aisle filled with Halloween decorations, including boxes labeled 'Zombie Babies' and 'RIP,' alongside purple bottles and cobwebs, creating a spooky atmosphere. A person in a yellow and blue shirt is seen browsing the store, adding a human element to the eerie setting. The video then shifts to a promotional image for 'Spirit Halloween,' featuring a sinister clown, a hooded skeleton, and a grim reaper, with a man walking towards the store entrance. The final frame encourages viewers to subscribe and watch more content, showing a masked figure in a red hoodie swinging on a swing against a fiery background, enhancing the Halloween theme.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip begins with a single male speaker expressing confusion about a toy, noting something strange and squishy about it, then comments on other toys, comparing their head squishiness. The tone is curious and slightly humorous. He transitions into a conversation with the toys themselves, still playfully confused, before stating that he is in a store trying to squish baby heads. He mentions other objects, noting a talking clown and pumpkin door knocker, frustrated that they don't work, before deciding to leave, saying he's "hotter than a pig". The audio ends abruptly with a loud crash sound, followed by an intense blast of synth music and a vocal sample shouting "Get away!" in a distorted, frantic tone.
